summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackOh K! Caffeine Eye Mask: A pair of hydrogel eye patches formulated with powerhouse ingredients to cool, brighten and de-puff the delicate eye area. Perfect for on-the-go, mornings when you need a little pick-me-up or right before you step out for the night.
details: DetailsKey IngredientsCaffeine - When applied topically caffeine stimulates blood flow to the area, making the skin appear radiant and bright.Ginseng - promotes elasticity and collagen production.Item 2609284How To UseClean face.Apply mask and leave on for 20-30 minutes.Remove mask and massage remaining essence into skin.Precautions: In the rate event of an adverse reaction discontinue use. For external use only. Please retain all information for future reference.IngredientsAqua (Water, Eau), Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Butylene Glycol, Chondrus Crispus Powder, Hydroxyacetophenone, Panthenol, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Citrus Junos Fruit Extract, Cellulose Gum, Caprylyl Glycol, Coffea Arabica (Coffee) Seed Powder, Potassium Chloride, Xanthan Gum, Polysorbate 20, Sucrose, Mica, Dextrin, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Caffeine, 1,2-Hexanediol, Pantolactone, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Panax Ginseng Berry Extract, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Disodium EDTA, Parfum (Fragrance), Iron Oxides(CI 77499)
how_to_use: Clean face.Apply mask and leave on for 20-30 minutes.Remove mask and massage remaining essence into skin.Precautions: In the rate event of an adverse reaction discontinue use. For external use only. Please retain all information for future reference.

reviews.headline: The best under eye mask yet.
reviews.comments: These are honestly the best under eye mask I've used yet. I wish I could buy them in bulk. The texture and thickness of the eye mask is perfect and they actually stay on your face while moving around. 10/10

reviews.headline: Not the best
reviews.comments: Smells and feels amazing. Didnt do anything though except leave some brown smudges.

reviews.headline: Love these!
reviews.comments: These are a life saver. I always keep a pair in the refrigerator. These are like some kind of magic. The way they brighten and wake up my red under eyes is amazing. I wish these came in a container of like 15 or 30 pairs. I dont like buying them individually because I use them so often. They are that good.

reviews.headline: Irritating
reviews.comments: Purchased because I didnt want to spend $$ to repurchase my PTR eye mask, but the minute I put on this mask, I started feeling a burning sensation, so I took it off immediately. Im not sure which ingredient is the culprit, but there is fragrance and I typically avoid products with fragrance for that reason. Will not repurchase and I do not recommend.

reviews.headline: I hate hate hate
reviews.comments: Coffee erm black

reviews.headline: Not worth it
reviews.comments: There was hardly any product in the package but I hoped maybe it was absorbed in the pad.  But after 30 mins I noticed zero difference.  The perks are it isn't terribly uncomfortable and they stay in place and it's inexpensive, but it was ineffectual

reviews.headline: Good for Travel
reviews.comments: I used these after a 10 hour flight that I couldn't sleep on and they made me look normal and not like a flight troll. Truly appreciated and a good size to slip into a carry-on.

reviews.headline: Wow!
reviews.comments: I loved this eye mask. It practically erases fine lines! Would definitely buy these again.

reviews.headline: Totally Worth It
reviews.comments: I have been on the look for something for my under-eye. I've tried serums and gels both with high end and affordable price points but this is it for me.

reviews.headline: My eyes felt so revived
reviews.comments: Really plumping and refreshing. I will buy some more as these work.

reviews.headline: Yes!!
reviews.comments: I've tried many caffeine under eye products, from under eye masks to creams and this one has to be my fave! Amazing results and such a pretty mask!

reviews.headline: Amazing product, 10/10
reviews.comments: Love these new eye masks! Super cute look, and I was very pleased with the results.

reviews.headline: Amazing!
reviews.comments: I was so pumped to try this when I saw it was coming out! Left me feeling so refreshed and such a cute look! Love it

reviews.headline: beautiful eyes
reviews.comments: my under eyes feel and look great after use

reviews.headline: I love this and will continue to use them
reviews.comments: Makes my under eyes feel a lot better, very pleased

reviews.headline: I recommend this to everyone
reviews.comments: thanks to Ulta and Oh K! for a great experience. I recommend everyone try this

reviews.headline: Absolutely loved these eye masks! 10/10!
reviews.comments: These eye masks are so cute! I love the packaging and the looks of the eye masks. I put them on in the morning and they were very refreshing and hydrating. Definitely recommend buying these!

reviews.headline: Best Eye Mask
reviews.comments: Love this new product.  The quality was better than anything I've tried before. The application was easy and the results Amazing!!!!

reviews.headline: BRILLIANT
reviews.comments: This mask has really made a difference to my eyes, they immediately felt brighter and the skin around the eyes felt hydrated and my eyes looked less tired.

reviews.headline: Love love love!!!!!
reviews.comments: I will always have a pack of these masks on hand because they make me feel and look great.  A real treat for your eyes!!!

faceoff_positive.comments: These are a life saver. I always keep a pair in the refrigerator. These are like some kind of magic. The way they brighten and wake up my red under eyes is amazing. I wish these came in a container of like 15 or 30 pairs. I dont like buying them individually because I use them so often. They are that good.
faceoff_positive.headline: Love these!

faceoff_negative.comments: There was hardly any product in the package but I hoped maybe it was absorbed in the pad.  But after 30 mins I noticed zero difference.  The perks are it isn't terribly uncomfortable and they stay in place and it's inexpensive, but it was ineffectual
